info.brief_description: You shrink on a TV news set and are found by a handsome male news anchor or reporter.
info.description:
You mysteriously find yourself shrunk in a television news studio or on a radio talk show set, where you are discovered and captured by a local or national newsman (news anchor, journalist, weatherman, sportscaster, etc.). The attractive newsman then plays with, humiliates, and torments you at your tiny size.

Choose from a variety of American, Canadian/French-Canadian, and European/international news personalities. Picture links to the newsmen will be included in each beginning chapter.

RULES:

- Please keep the story M/m gay.
- No growth or other transformations, and no gentle interactions.
- Violence and sexual content are encouraged. Death and gore are allowed, but only in later chapters.
- Avoid choice chapters as much as possible.

I will award 400 GPs for each detailed chapter addition which employs proper spelling and grammar. I welcome all contributions.

Enjoy. ~~
